It's the difference between walking through a maze, and seeing a maze from above. When you're walking, you have to guess; left or right. Once you know, it's obvious, but before that, you just try. If you see a maze from above, you can look at all your options, and figure out the right one before you take out a pen and draw in the path. You can still figure it out by guessing, "walking" the path with your pen but you can also keep the overview and figure it out.
